ai-patthana10.1:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 5.)

ai-patthana10.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-patthana10.1:2.1_0: Not knowing the teaching of the unskillful, not for the sake of causes.
ai-patthana10.1:2.1_1: Not knowing the teaching of the unskillful, they don’t give rise to the cause.
ai-patthana10.1:2.1_2: Not knowing the teaching of the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.1:2.1_3: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful things, or not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.1:2.1_4: not for the sake of the unskillful ...
ai-patthana10.1:3.1_0: Not knowing the teaching of the unskillful, they don’t give rise to the causes of the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.1:3.1_1: Not knowing the teaching of the unskillful, not for the sake of the skillful.
ai-patthana10.1:3.1_2: Not knowing the teaching of the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.1:3.1_3: Not knowing the principle for the sake of unskillful things, nor for the sake of causes and reason.
ai-patthana10.1:3.1_4: not for the sake of unskillful qualities that arise because of unskillful ... for the sake of skillful qualities.
ai-patthana10.1:4.1_0: Nor do they arise because of answering for the sake of deterioration.
ai-patthana10.1:4.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the reason for the sake of unskillful.
ai-patthana10.1:4.1_2: not for the sake of unkilled in the doctrines of others.
ai-patthana10.1:4.1_3: Nor do they arise because of declared by the reason for this.
ai-patthana10.1:4.1_4: Nor do they arise because of past insanity.
ai-patthana10.1:4.1_5: Nor do they arise because of past the unskillful and not for the sake of causes unskillful qualities to arise because of these six reasons.
ai-patthana10.1:5.1_0: No to cause the unskillful qualities to arise by not, and by the sake of lacking common sense.
ai-patthana10.1:5.1_1: No for the sake of the unskillful or for the sake of not for the sake of purification by skillful quality.
ai-patthana10.1:5.1_2: No to cause the reason for the sake of declaring his unskillful qualities to arise because of wrong conduct.
ai-patthana10.1:5.1_3: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not for the sake of answering.
ai-patthana10.1:5.1_4: But they don’t arise because of the unskillful and the causes unskillful qualities to be skillful.
ai-patthana10.1:6.1_0: But they don’t cause any unskillful qualities to arise because of their unskillfulness, or for the sake of a cause.
ai-patthana10.1:6.1_1: But they don’t cause any unskillful qualities to arise because of not by the skillful.
ai-patthana10.1:6.1_2: But because of this the unskillful does not cause or reason for the sake of realizing this teaching, nor because of speaking.
ai-patthana10.1:6.1_3: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not for the sake of answering for the sake of a certain reason.
ai-patthana10.1:6.1_4: But they don’t cause any unskillful qualities to arise because of not, or for the sake of themselves.
ai-patthana10.1:7.1_0: Nor do they give rise to the teaching of the skillful and the causes.
ai-patthana10.1:7.1_1: Not knowing the teaching of the skillful and the cause for the sake of purification by unskillful.
ai-patthana10.1:7.1_2: But they don’t arise because of the unskillful and the causes.
ai-patthana10.1:8.1_0: (These four discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-patthana10.1:9.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.1:9.1_1: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.1:9.1_3: Nor do they arise because of unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana10.1:9.1_4: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not skilled in the cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.1:10.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.1:11.1_0: Nor does she have no declared: ‘This is for the sake of answering.’ ...
ai-patthana10.1:12.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not the cause or reason for the sake of answering ... for the sake of causes unskillful qualities to arise.
ai-patthana10.1:13.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not the cause for the reason for the sake of not unskillful. ...
ai-patthana10.1:14.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not the cause or reason for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.1:15.1_0: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
